verses.text: Save me, O God, by thy name, and judge me by thy strength.
Hear my prayer, O God; give ear to the words of my mouth.
For strangers are risen up against me, and oppressors seek after my soul: they have not set God before them. Selah.

Behold, God
is mine helper: the Lord
is with them that uphold my soul.
He shall reward evil unto mine enemies: cut them off in thy truth.

I will freely sacrifice unto thee: I will praise thy name, O LORD; for
it is good.

For he hath delivered me out of all trouble: and mine eye hath seen
his desire upon mine enemies.

text:
Save me, O God, by thy name, and judge me by thy strength.
Hear my prayer, O God; give ear to the words of my mouth.
For strangers are risen up against me, and oppressors seek after my soul: they have not set God before them. Selah.
Behold, God
is mine helper: the Lord
is with them that uphold my soul.
He shall reward evil unto mine enemies: cut them off in thy truth.
I will freely sacrifice unto thee: I will praise thy name, O LORD; for
it is good.
For he hath delivered me out of all trouble: and mine eye hath seen
his desire upon mine enemies.
